name: AJ Fernandez - San Lotano - Dominicano - Gordo
additionalNotes: San Lotano Dominicano is handmade in the Dominican Republic and blended by boutique cigar-maker AJ Fernandez. A reddish-brown Brazilian wrapper leaf embraces a medium-bodied recipe of Dominican and Nicaraguan binder and filler tobaccos in a collection of traditional shapes. Tasting notes of fresh ground coffee, caramel, licorice, and cocoa beans emerge before a toasted finish.Â
